greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = total sum of odd/even parts >= k in all partitions of n, if k is odd/even.
comment: Essentially this sequence is related to A206561 in the same way as A206563 is related to A181187. See the calculation in the example section of A206563.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..141, flattened
maple: b:= proc(n, i) option remember; local f, g;
else f:= b(n, i-1); g:= `if`(i>n, [0], b(n-i, i));
mathematica: p[f_, g_] := With[{m = Max[Length[f], Length[g]]}, PadRight[f, m, 0] + PadRight[g, m, 0]]; b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = Module[{f, g}, Which[n == 0, {1}, i == 1, {1, n}, True, f = b[n, i-1]; g = If[i>n, {0}, b[n-i, i]]; p[p[f, g], Append[Array[0&, i], g[[1]]]]]]; T[n_] := Module[{l}, l = b[n, n]; Table[Sum[l[[i+2j+1]]*(i+2j), {j, 0, (n-i)/2}], {i, 1, n}]]; Table[T[n], {n, 1, 14}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 11 2015, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
xref: Column 1-2: A066967, A066966. Right border is A000027.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Feb 28 2012
ext: More terms from _Alois P. Heinz_, Mar 21 2012
